response.original_title: 呪怨ノ動画 カルマ
response.overview: All spiritual phenomena are cause and effect. Human karma is deeply involved. Those who have been consumed by negative karma. Those who are caught up in the karma of others and wander in darkness. They still cannot be exorcised, but appear as retribution to those who have the same negative karma. This collection of images is a compilation of images of the spiritual phenomena that have been recorded and handed to us to be verified as the retribution of karma. Those who feel the karma of this collection of images must be equally possessed by the same karma.
response.title: The Grudge: Video Karma
